metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7039 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the MHD_digest_auth_check function in libmicrohttpd before 0.9.32, when MHD_OPTION_CONNECTION_MEMORY_LIMIT is set to a large value, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a long URI in an authentication header.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmicrohttpd10 - 0.9.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmicrohttpd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.32-1').
